root.name: Shadowgate 64: The Trials of the Four Towers
root.description: Â Shadowgate 64 takes place a century after the first Shadowgate. You take on the role of Del Cottonwood, a halfling who traveled by caravan into Shadowgate and was imprisoned by bandits. After breaking free you embark on a quest through the Four Towers. Utilizing books and clues from various towns folk as well as ghosts of the deceased, you must figure out the story of Shadowgate.
